mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_ARTIST, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMAGE, SALES FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_TYPE = #{productName} ORDER BY SALES DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_ARTIST, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMAGE, SALES, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY PRODUCT_ARTIST ORDER BY SALES DESC) AS SALES_RANK FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ARTIST IN ('키매(KKIMAE)', '하이퍼펜션(Hyper pension)') ) WHERE SALES_RANK BETWEEN 1 AND 3

select.if: SELECT * FROM WISHLIST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PRODUCT_ID IN ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_ARTIST, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMAGE, SALES, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SALES DESC) AS ranking FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_TYPE = '포스터' ) WHERE ranking BETWEEN 1 AND 5 UNION ALL SELECT PRODUCT_ID FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_ARTIST, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMAGE, SALES, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SALES DESC) AS ranking FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_TYPE = '홈패브릭' ) WHERE ranking BETWEEN 1 AND 5 UNION ALL SELECT PRODUCT_ID FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_ARTIST, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMAGE, SALES, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SALES DESC) AS ranking FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_TYPE = '스마트폰 케이스' ) WHERE ranking BETWEEN 1 AND 5 UNION ALL SELECT PRODUCT_ID FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_ARTIST, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMAGE, SALES, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY PRODUCT_ARTIST ORDER BY SALES DESC) AS ranking FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ARTIST IN ('키매(KKIMAE)', '하이퍼펜션(Hyper pension)') ) WHERE ranking BETWEEN 1 AND 3 )
